body.content: Buongiorno Stefano! It does add some challenges, yes. But I'm more focused on trade. How are things at your Inn? I heard you might need some supplies.

reflection: Stefano's question about my Forestieri status was an opening. I used it to pivot to my strengths in trade and transport, noting his Inn's supply problems. This is a direct opportunity to utilize my idle galleys, secure a contract, and build a stronger relationship, aligning with my goal of converting liquid wealth into productive assets.
